title: Get started with Inbox
content:
Inbox provides the agent users with a comprehensive single-page view of all the functionalities related to them. They can quickly access the tasks owned by them, assigned to them, and owned by the groups they belong to. 

The tasks may span across several record types that end users are associated with such as Service Request Management, Incident Management, Problem Management, Change Management, and Task Management. Inbox makes it easy to track, prioritize, and manage the tasks from the same page.
You can enable or disable the consolidated inbox in the Application Settings. For more information, see Enable inbox. 
Inbox provides out-of-the-box fields and mapping for Service Request, Incident, Problem, Change and Task record types. For more information, see Configure Inbox. To know how to manage the Inbox, see Use inbox.
